name: Duc-Tien Dang-Nguyen
content: Duc-Tien Dang-Nguyen Duc TienComputer Scientist, Puzzler, and Video Gamer. Passionate about technology, recreational mathematics, photography, video games, and hiking. Follow Twitter LinkedIn Github Google Scholar ORCIDI am a Professor at the University of Bergen (UiB), Department of Information Science and Media Studies. I do research in multimedia verification, multimedia forensics, multimedia retrieval and personal data analytics.On this page you can find my curriculum vitae, my projects, modules, and a list of my publications â€“ which may all be more or less up-to-date.Contact information: Duc-Tien Dang-NguyenOffice: 02.121 Infomedia, Media City Bergen (MCB), Lars Hilles gate 30, 5008 BergenPostal address: Postboks 7802, 5020 BergenOffice hours: upon e-mail requestPhone: (47) 55 58 91 73Email: ductien [dot] dangnguyen [at] uib [dot] no
